lookList.content: 选的最小尺寸在家还是转不过来，质量不错，没异味
lookList.tagInfo: {"picUrl":"https://yanxuan.nosdn.127.net/bc166d3142be1b7a6c2471faee501632.jpg","videoUrl":"","width":816,"rank":0,"isVideo":false,"comment":[{"itemId":3990617,"picUrl":"https://yanxuan-item.nosdn.127.net/74f8ecb27834ecebfb77e18edaf83b1a.png","itemName":"玩水一“夏”，儿童卡通游泳圈","positionRight":true,"top":742,"left":530,"price":"24.9","itemStatus":2,"position":2,"itemDesc":"加厚PVC+防漏气嘴，安全游泳双保险","tagName":"儿童卡通游泳圈","cart":false}],"url":"https://yanxuan.nosdn.127.net/bc166d3142be1b7a6c2471faee501632.jpg","height":1088}

lookList.content: 还不错啦，但是还可以做得更好：做成翻盖的，有保护盖更好；增加橡皮擦功能，可以局部修改，价格也可以相应调整哈哈😄
lookList.tagInfo: {"picUrl":"https://yanxuan.nosdn.127.net/026fb82f9a09e2de6b87f72757838a5d.jpg","videoUrl":"","width":1216,"rank":0,"isVideo":false,"comment":[{"itemId":3409001,"picUrl":"https://yanxuan-item.nosdn.127.net/39966f1399aab169e390ee9254b95328.png","itemName":"【3岁+】无纸涂鸦新体验，儿童液晶涂鸦画板","positionRight":true,"top":480,"left":390,"price":"68","itemStatus":2,"position":2,"itemDesc":"多彩屏幕，反复绘画","tagName":"【3岁+】儿童液晶涂鸦画板","cart":false}],"url":"https://yanxuan.nosdn.127.net/026fb82f9a09e2de6b87f72757838a5d.jpg","height":912}

lookList.content:
布鲁喊你起床啦
布鲁喊你睡觉啦
最后这个动作看一次笑一次😂😁
lookList.tagInfo: {"picUrl":"https://yanxuan.nosdn.127.net/3f590adbf6bcbf303aee1dfd0a665dfa.jpg","videoUrl":"","width":1000,"rank":0,"isVideo":false,"comment":[{"itemId":1664017,"picUrl":"https://yanxuan-item.nosdn.127.net/a741310da71517d6be23e4cd93769a7c.png","itemName":"陪你宅·萌宠抱枕","positionRight":true,"top":122,"left":514,"price":"49","itemStatus":2,"position":2,"itemDesc":"柔密短绒抱感，贴心陪你宅","tagName":"陪你宅·萌宠抱枕","cart":false}],"url":"https://yanxuan.nosdn.127.net/3f590adbf6bcbf303aee1dfd0a665dfa.jpg","height":1000}

lookList.content:
娃儿一个多月就在给她用，现在两个多月了，娃儿比较小还是不容易放进去，有点挤，那个
安全带太卡地方了，大点取了里子或者娃儿可以坐了要好些应该。
lookList.tagInfo: {"picUrl":"https://yanxuan.nosdn.127.net/440eab1b47938a15d8d1b70cac4d0d57.jpg","videoUrl":"","width":750,"rank":0,"isVideo":false,"comment":[{"itemId":1687095,"picUrl":"https://yanxuan-item.nosdn.127.net/aed206e6e9f99a8bccc60f1224ee887e.png","itemName":"儿童汽车安全座椅 0-4岁","positionRight":true,"top":446,"left":420,"price":"1499","itemStatus":2,"position":2,"itemDesc":"ISOFIX接口，360度一键旋转","tagName":"儿童汽车安全座椅 0-4岁","cart":false}],"url":"https://yanxuan.nosdn.127.net/440eab1b47938a15d8d1b70cac4d0d57.jpg","height":1000}

lookList.content: 从小家伙的贪吃和表情就能知道她多喜欢这个枣子了。可能会觉得水分没有想象中的足，但是知道是沙漠里种植的，味道酸甜正好，健康没有泡过糖水，给孩子吃放心😊
lookList.tagInfo: {"picUrl":"https://yanxuan.nosdn.127.net/0e047a138ad744041964260d89f584d3.jpg","videoUrl":"","width":912,"rank":0,"isVideo":false,"comment":[{"itemId":3993504,"picUrl":"https://yanxuan-item.nosdn.127.net/bdcb48d8001b7bee27fed2f766d8831f.png","itemName":"始于唐朝的“皇室贡品”，灵武长枣 2斤","positionRight":true,"top":792,"left":440,"price":"59","itemStatus":2,"position":2,"itemDesc":"酸甜汁多，质密脆爽","tagName":"灵武长枣 2斤","cart":false}],"url":"https://yanxuan.nosdn.127.net/0e047a138ad744041964260d89f584d3.jpg","height":1216}

lookList.content: 选择护眼灯对比好几家，最终选了严选。外观设计简洁质感好，灯座大，整个灯有点重。可调节亮度，光线柔和。AA级，我看中此款灯杆长，可360度调节。280元入手，整体比较满意。
lookList.tagInfo: {"picUrl":"https://yanxuan.nosdn.127.net/e7863eaffb5a90e0e10269275404bd52.jpg","videoUrl":"","width":1000,"rank":0,"isVideo":false,"comment":[{"itemId":1691011,"picUrl":"https://yanxuan-item.nosdn.127.net/697d308a74b37e52932990d471593f69.png","itemName":"学霸学习，国AA级护眼认证，智能护目灯","positionRight":true,"top":216,"left":194,"price":"299","itemStatus":2,"position":2,"itemDesc":"国AA级，新国标认证","tagName":"国AA级护眼认证，智能护目灯","cart":false}],"url":"https://yanxuan.nosdn.127.net/e7863eaffb5a90e0e10269275404bd52.jpg","height":750}

lookList.content: 背包很轻，很好看，宝宝一岁3个月，背着很合适。此后天出门水杯、尿布、纸巾都自己背啦。
